title: The Design Story: BeoSound 1 & BeoSound 2
description:
BeoSound 1 & BeoSound 2 explained in two minutes. The two wireless speaker systems are tasked with catering to a growing group of people, who wish to live more flexible. So how do we design products that put humans before technology? Marie Kristine Schmidt, Vice President of Brand, Design & Marketing elaborates.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Bang & Olufsen Speakers, Headphones, & Audio Products. Shop for the Bang & Olufsen BeoSound 1 Speaker as well as Bang & Olufsen's full line at Abt!
